metadata.title: CVE-2022-2630 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An improper access control issue in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 15.2 before 15.2.4, all versions from 15.3 before 15.3.2allows disclosure of confidential information via the Incident timelineevents.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
